name: FurtherLands
description:
This is my first game made with Construct2D and I made just to practise.

That doesn't mean I will not upgrade it and stop updating it.

The controls are:

  - Shift to make slowmotion

  - 'A' and 'D' to go to the left and right

  - 'W' or 'Space' to jump

  - Drag the mouse to aim the weapon

  - Left click to shoot.

  - 'R' to reload the weapon.

  - 'R' to restart the game when you dead or reach the flag

  - 'Space' to go to the main menu when you dead or reach the flag
